name: The Chalice of Renunciation
data: It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The chalice speaks within your mind as you attempt to scry its
magical properties: 'Renounce your carnal trappings if you wish
